sql-statements.statement: insert into Persess_View_Count (session_id, person_id, view_scope, view_key, view_count, view_caption, view_arl, view_init, view_latest) values (? , ? , ? , ? , 1 , ? , ? , sysdate , sysdate)

select view_caption, view_count, decode(to_char(view_init - ?, 'YYYYMMDD'), to_char(sysdate - ?, 'YYYYMMDD'), to_char(view_init - ?, 'hh:miam'), to_char(view_init - ?, 'MM/DD/YYYY hh:miam')), decode(to_char(view_latest - ?, 'YYYYMMDD'), to_char(sysdate - ?, 'YYYYMMDD'), to_char(view_latest - ?, 'hh:miam'), to_char(view_latest - ?, 'MM/DD/YYYY hh:miam')), view_arl from Persess_View_Count where person_id = ? and view_init > trunc(sysdate) + ? order by view_count DESC
select * from Persess_View_Count where person_id = ? and view_init >= trunc(sysdate) and view_scope = ? and view_key = ?
update Persess_View_Count set view_count = view_count +1, view_latest = sysdate where person_id = ? and view_init >= trunc(sysdate) and view_scope = ? and view_key = ?
